segments.text: She works as a teller in a bank .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does she go to night school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . She goes three times a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? What does she want to be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She wants to be a manager .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She takes classes in accounting and business .
segments.speaker: S2
